TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to create and add several Routes (Route Sub-Types) in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates several Routes. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes message elements belonging to the ControlFeature message schema area, for instance Ground Picture > Battlespace Geometry. Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the created Routes are displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the AirCorridor correctly.
Nation B receives and displays the ConventionalRoute correctly.
Nation B receives and displays the MainSupplyRoute correctly.
Nation B receives and displays the StandardRoute correctly.
